articleContent:
Dear Rovers,

To bring you exciting new content and a better gaming experience, we will soon be conducting the update maintenance for Version 2.0: All Silent Souls Can Sing.

During the maintenance, you will be unable to log in to the game, so please plan your time accordingly. Additionally, due to the large size of the update, we recommend updating the game while connected to a Wi-Fi network. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.




[Maintenance Time & Compensation Details]

✦Maintenance Time: 2025-01-02 04:00 - 2025-01-02 11:00 (UTC+8)

✦Maintenance Compensation: Astrite x300, Crystal Solvent x2

✦Compensation Eligibility: Create a character and unlock the Mails feature before 2025-01-02 04:00 (UTC+8). The compensation can be claimed before the next version update.

※In the event that the maintenance is extended, the dev team will issue a follow-up notice and adjust the compensation accordingly.




[How to Update]

Once the maintenance for the version update begins, you can follow the following instructions to update your client.

✦Android: Launch the game and follow the instructions in the update pop-up window to complete the update.

✦iOS: Update the game in the App Store.

✦PC: Close the game, restart the launcher, and then click on "Update."




[PC Pre-download]

✦PC Pre-download Start Time: 2024-12-31 09:30 (UTC+8)

※With the pre-download feature enabled, "New Version Pre-download" appears below the "Start" button on the Launcher interface. Select this option to pre-download the material for the latest version. You can continue playing the game while the pre-downloading process is ongoing. The process can be paused at any time. Whether it is complete or not, the update maintenance will speed up to a certain degree when initiated.

※The pre-download package is about 45 GB in size. To ensure smoother decompressing and installing processes, it is recommended you have at least 60 GB of spare storage space on your PC.




[Version 2.0 Preview]

✦New Region

Rinascita

Ragunna, in southern Rinascita, holds the closest bond with their Sentinel Imperator among the nation's many city-states. Most Ragunnesi worship the Sentinel, viewing Common Echoes as divine blessings. Ragunna is also home to the Order of the Deep, widely regarded as the Sentinel's earthly emissaries.

The Black Shores report that the Threnodian in Ragunna remains dormant. In recent years, however, even Sentinel Imperator has fallen silent, no longer speaking directly to the Ragunnesi...




✦New Resonators

5-Star Resonators: Carlotta, Roccia

※5-Star Resonator Carlotta can be obtained through the [When Silence Tolls] Featured Resonator Convene. 5-Star Resonator Roccia can be obtained through the [Stage in the Box] Featured Resonator Convene.




✦New Weapons

5-Star Weapons: The Last Dance, Tragicomedy

4-Star Weapon: Call of the Abyss

4-Star Weapon Series (Poetry and Paean): Meditations on Mercy, Fables of Wisdom, Romance in Farewell, Legend of Drunken Hero, Waltz in Masquerade




✦New Echoes

Hecate, Lorelei, Dragon of Dirge, Sentry Construct, Questless Knight, Diurnus Knight, Nocturnus Knight, Abyssal Gladius, Abyssal Mercator, Abyssal Patricius, Chop Chop, Vitreum Dancer, Cuddle Wuddle, Chop Chop: Leftless, Chop Chop: Rightless, Chop Chop: Headless, Fae Ignis, Nimbus Wraith, Hocus Pocus, Lottie Lost, Diggy Duggy, Frostscourge Stalker, Voltscourge Stalker, Galescourge Stalker, Chest Mimic, Nightmare: Feilian Beringal, Nightmare: Impermanence Heron, Nightmare: Thundering Mephis, Nightmare: Tempest Mephis, Nightmare: Crownless, Nightmare: Inferno Rider, Nightmare: Mourning Aix




✦New Events

[Rinascita] Regional Events: Tales of the Isles - Area Exploration Event, Traces of Tides - Photo Collection Event

[Although Colors Have No Form] Featured Co-op Combat Event

[Lollo Campaign: Comeback] Featured Commission Event

[John Wicktorio: No Debts for Old Men] Featured Combat Event

[Pincer Maneuver Warriors] Recurring Combat Event

[Celebration Aftertunes] Gratitude for Companionship

[Dances For Spring's Return] Companion Invitation Login Event




✦New Stories

Main Quest Chapter II: All Silent Souls Can Sing

As you looked into the repaired Tethys System for ways to solve Abby's bodily issues, you stumbled upon a Beacon you had set for yourself. Your past self pointed you in the direction of the distant land across the sea.

Time to set forth, Rover. Brave the storms and undercurrents to reach the grand celebration that awaits—and to honor the ancient pact you made long ago...




Main Quest: Chapter II Prologue - Through the Sea Thou Break

Main Quest: Chapter II Act I - The Sacred Breeze So Often Breathes

Main Quest: Chapter II Act II - Veils Off in Sun or Shadow

Main Quest: Chapter II Act III - What Yesterday Wept, Today Doth Sing

Carlotta's Companion Story: If On a Rainy Night a Family

Roccia's Companion Story: Starry is the Night




✦Other New Content

New Tactical Hologram Challenges: Tactical Hologram - Phantom Pain

New Gameplay: Amidst the Sea of Clouds

New Phantom Echoes: Phantom - Sentry Construct, Phantom - Questless Knight, Phantom - Vitreum Dancer

New Feature: Outfits (New Outfits: Exorcistic Adjuration, Peach Blossom)

※Participate in Glamour Couture to try out Jinhsi's Outfit "Peach Blossom."

※Participate in Dances For Spring's Return: Companion Invitation Login Event to claim Sanhua's Signature Outfit (Exorcistic Adjuration) for free.




※For more details on the new content, optimizations, and bug fixes coming to the game in Version 2.0: All Silent Souls Can Sing, please stay tuned for the upcoming release notes.




[Device Requirements]

To ensure a smooth experience, please refer to the following requirements:




①Minimum

Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 835, MediaTek G71/72 or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

iOS: [System] iOS 14 or later; [Model] iPhone 11 or newer, iPad with A13 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 4 GB or more

PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I5 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 2700; [GPU] Geforce 1060/RX570/Intel ARC A380, [RAM] 16 GB or more




②Recommended

Android: [System] Android 7.0 or later; [Processor] Snapdragon 8 Gen1+/Gen2/Gen3 or MediaTek processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more

iOS: [System] iOS 15 or later; [Model] iPhone 13 or newer, iPad with A15 Bionic or processors of better/equivalent performance; [RAM] 6 GB or more

PC: [System] Windows 10 64-bit; [CPU] Intel I7 (9th Gen)/Ryzen 3700, [GPU] Geforce 2060/RX5700XT/Intel ARC A750; [RAM] 16 GB or more




③Required Storage Space

Android/iOS: 25 GB

PC: 60 GB; it's recommended to install the game on an SSD.




④Controller Support

Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on Mobile:

Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series, DualShock®4, DualSense®, DualSense Edge™

Wuthering Waves currently supports the following controllers on PC:

Wired/Wireless Controllers: Xbox series, Xbox Elite series, DualSense®, DualSense Edge™

Wired Controllers: DualShock®4
